clarification: Appointment decisions include hiring, firing and promotions in the armed forces. Note that the question refers to the typical de facto (rather than de jure) situation obtaining in the armed forces. If there are large differences between different branches of the armed forces or between top and lower level ranks please try to consider the average when answering the question.
cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v3stcritapparm
